Detailed Description

implementation uderlying the ModuleDescriptor class.

Contains information stored in the Brokers repository about a given module.

Definition at line 76 of file ImplModuleDescriptor.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ImplModuleDescriptor::ImplModuleDescriptor (  DataBlockReader    reader ) 
 

creates a new ImplModuleDescriptor using the data in reader.

Assumes that the data is at the cursor in reader.

Parameters:
reader  contains the data for the module descriptor.
